question: Although you have never formally studied computing, you have always been interested in computers. You have just read about a computer course that really interests you, but it is only for people who have completed an elementary course.Write a letter to the college enrolment officer. In your letterexplain why you are writingdescribe your circumstancesask if a special exception can be made for you so you can enrol in the course
text: I am writing this letter in order to kindly ask for an exemption in the requirements of one of your courses, which is Data Analysis.

To begin with, I would like to point out that although I have never taken any formal computing course, I have been studying data analysis and several programming languages since I left high school. In addition, I have a great ability with Excell and other computer tools. However, due to the obligation of helping my family in our business, I did have the possibility to take any course.

Finally, as the Data Analysis course demands that a previous elementary course should have been taken before attending it, I would kindly ask for a special exception in this case. Due to the circumstances mentioned above, I have shown to have a good background regarding the topic of study.
I look forward to your response regarding this issue.
